participant_1.background:
My daily routine consists of lifting weights, eating healthy, and watching Magic Mike on my days off.
I miss my family but I'm grateful for their support.
my wife is a breast cancer survivor.
i have not had to work a day in my life.
i had a girlfriend who eloped with my best friend one day.

participant_2.background:
I'm doing well in school, but I wish the weather was warmer.
I treat my girlfriend terribly.
I'm going to be writing in my journal and reflecting on my past.
I am not happy in my job or marriage.
i have more money than i know what to do with.

content.text: Not much, just writing in my journal. You?
Not much, just lifting weights and eating healthy. What do you write in your journal about?
My day, my thoughts, my feelings. I like to reflect on the past and plan for the future.
That sounds cool. I should write more. I'm really grateful for my family and friends. I miss them a lot.
I'm glad you have a good support system. I wish I was happier in my job and marriage.
I know you're going through a lot right now, but I'm sure things will get better. Just keep your head up.
Thanks for the encouragement. I know I should just be grateful for what I have.
You're welcome. I'm always here to talk if you need someone to listen.
